story: You are looking for running shoes. You run after work on neighborhood streets and the local path, usually five to eight miles, with a longer run here and there. You want a road shoe that’s soft on your knees and calves so back-to-back days don’t beat you up. It should feel smooth and steady at an easy pace, not stiff or twitchy, and stay light enough that you forget about it once you settle in. A breathable upper helps when the weather warms up. Durability matters too, and you expect it to hold up for regular weekly mileage without falling apart.

target.content: title: HOKA ONE ONE Men's Clifton 2 Running Shoes  features: Rubber sole  description: HOKA One One Men's Clifton 2 running shoes feature an synthetic and mesh upper. Lightweight No Sew SpeedFrame Construction for comfort. HOKA Race Lace provides a secure and lightweight alternative to regular laces with the added benefit of decreased water retention. Lightly padded tongue provides increased protection across the foot. Structural overlays improve mid-foot support. Early Stage Meta-Rocker midsole supports a runners form and encourages a continuous Positive Gait Speed roll from heel-strike to toe-off. A Full Length HIP CMEVA midsole which is up to 2.5X the volume than standard running shoes provides signature cushioning and excellent shock absorption and an inherently stable ride. 4mm Heel to Toe Offset; Full Ground Contact Design. Strategic Hi-Abrasion Rubber Zoned outsole for durable traction withes strategically placed rubber pods to improve durability.  details: Is Discontinued By Manufacturer: No Item model number: 1008328-TBOF Department: mens Date First Available: June 8, 2015 Manufacturer: HOKA ONE ONE
target.title: HOKA ONE ONE Men's Clifton 2 Running Shoes

story: You’re a woman in your 30s looking for trail running shoes. Your routes are park singletrack, wooded paths, and hilly fire roads that turn slick after rain. You want grip that holds in mud and loose gravel and stays steady on wet roots and stone steps. You need some protection under the forefoot for sharp rocks, without a stiff, clunky feel. The fit should be stable and neutral, locking your heel and midfoot so you don’t slide on side slopes. The upper should breathe and keep grit out, with a reinforced front for scuffs. You want enough bounce uphill and control downhill for year-round runs.

target.content: title: Saucony Women's Peregrine 10 Trail Running Shoe  features: Synthetic-and-mesh Imported Rubber sole Shaft measures approximately mid-top from arch Aggressive lugs made of PWRTRAC tacky rubber conform to dig in and confidently grip a wide variety of terrains New PWRRUN cushioning ensures a responsive yet protective feel to push uphill and bomb downhill with confidence Rock plate that provides additional protection Reinforced to protect feet from trail debris, the trail-specific FORMFIT design gives the perfect lock-down fit over uneven terrain Category: Neutral  description: Peregrine 10.  details: Item model number: Peregrine 10 Department: Womens Date First Available: June 18, 2019 Manufacturer: Saucony

story: You’re a man in your 40s looking for road shoes. Most runs are on pavement and bike paths, with some treadmill time when it’s raining. You tend to roll inward a bit and want a shoe that keeps you centered without feeling stiff. The heel should stay locked on downhills and when you pick up the pace late. Underfoot should feel smooth and steady, with enough cushion to blunt concrete but not so soft that corners feel wobbly. The upper needs to breathe and hold your midfoot. You want a durable, consistent ride from easy days to longer weekend runs.

target.content: title: ASICS Mens GT-2000 3  features: 100% Textile/Synthetic Imported Rubber sole Lightweight running shoe with breathable mesh upper featuring synthetic overlays Heel Clutching System ComforDry sockliner I.G.S (Impact Guidance System) FluidRide midsole Rearfoot and forefoot GEL cushioning system AHAR rubber outsole  description: In 1949, Mr. Kihachiro Onitsuka began his athletic footwear company (Onitsuka Co., Ltd.) by manufacturing basketball shoes out of his living room in Kobe, Japan. He chose the name ASICS for his company in 1977, based on a famous Latin phrase "Anima Sana In Corpore Sano," which, when translated, expresses the ancient ideal of "A Sound Mind in a Sound Body." Taking the acronym of this phrase, ASICS was founded on the belief that the best way to create a healthy and happy lifestyle is to promote total health and fitness. Today, ASICS offers a full line of performance-driven athletic shoes and technical active sports apparel and accessories dedicated to bringing harmony to the body and soul.  details: Package Dimensions: 12.4 x 7.5 x 4.8 inches; 9.6 Ounces Item model number: GT-2000 3-M Department: mens Date First Available: May 4, 2015 Manufacturer: ASICS America Corporation
target.title: ASICS Mens GT-2000 3
